surgical resection requiring pneumonectomy and mediastinal lymphadenectomy
healing right pneumonectomy wound site without infection
cardiac point of maximal impulse shifted toward the left

minimal and serous chest tube fluid output on hospital day 10
no increase in chest drain output
right pigtail catheter removed on hospital day 13
left chest tube removed on hospital day 14
right leg deep venous thrombosis noted on admission
diagnosed with heparin-induced thrombocytopenia with thrombosis
retrievable inferior vena cava filter placed
tolerating regular diet at four-month follow-up
